pullrequest.title: PIMPL-ized a few classes, reduced code duplication for ImageView

content.raw:
I made some minor changes in [image_view_improvements_ian](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/image_view_improvements_ian..image_view_improvements#diff) branch. Main thing was to remove this warning message produced when opening a multicamera topic viewer:

`QLayout: Attempting to add QLayout "" to gazebo::gui::ImagesView "cameraSensor", which already has a layout`
content.html:
I made some minor changes in image_view_improvements_ian branch. Main thing was to remove this warning message produced when opening a multicamera topic viewer:

QLayout: Attempting to add QLayout "" to gazebo::gui::ImagesView "cameraSensor", which already has a layout
